name: Unify!
description:
Tap on the numbers and Unify!

Unify! Is a puzzle game with the main goal of unifying numbers to the highest you can get. Start with a ​5x5 board and the numbers given, earn coins as you play, and make your own strategy!

Use the 4 boosters:
• Bomb: Remove a tile.
• Switcher: Switch two tiles.
• Color Elixir: Blast all tiles of one number.
• Magnet!: Bring all the numbers next to each other.

Can’t keep up with the increasing range of numbers? Use your coin to increase the lower bound by one and don’t give up!
